entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Snow or periods of ice pellets in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
